summary:
Ragged Flagon is so dark!!
I can not see Guild members clearly.
descriptionHtml:
Thieves Guild is my favorites faction in Skyrim.
What a interesting quests are!!
It's so funny to me what is to visit Ragged Flagon.

But!!

Ragged Flagon is so dark!!
I can not see Guild members clearly.

I fixed this issue.
This mod can change Ragged Flagon lights to brighten.

----
This mod is NOT light all area of Ragged Flagon.
Just changed brighten dark area a little.
I know that thieves not like brightness.

* But, I added one light to side of counter.
It is dependency my playing environment.
This is no big problem for everyone.
author: Ogaaaan
